name: youtube-music-desktop-app-controller
title: Youtube Music Desktop App Controller
description: Controle Youtube Music Desktop App from Raycast
author: muditmahajan21

commands.name: ytmd
commands.title: YTMdesktop Setup
commands.description: Control Youtube Music Desktop App from Raycast

commands.name: playPause
commands.title: Play/Pause
commands.subtitle: Play/Pause for Youtube Music Desktop App
commands.description: Play or pause the current track in Youtube Music Desktop App

commands.name: play
commands.title: Play
commands.subtitle: Play for Youtube Music Desktop App
commands.description: Start playing music in Youtube Music Desktop App

commands.name: pause
commands.title: Pause
commands.subtitle: Pause for Youtube Music Desktop App
commands.description: Pause the current track in Youtube Music Desktop App

commands.name: volumeUp
commands.title: Volume Up
commands.subtitle: Increase Volume for Youtube Music Desktop App
commands.description: Increase the volume in Youtube Music Desktop App

commands.name: volumeDown
commands.title: Volume Down
commands.subtitle: Decrease Volume for Youtube Music Desktop App
commands.description: Decrease the volume in Youtube Music Desktop App

commands.name: next
commands.title: Next Track
commands.subtitle: Next Track for Youtube Music Desktop App
commands.description: Skip to the next track in Youtube Music Desktop App

commands.name: previous
commands.title: Previous Track
commands.subtitle: Previous Track for Youtube Music Desktop App
commands.description: Go back to the previous track in Youtube Music Desktop App

commands.name: toggleLike
commands.title: Toggle Like
commands.subtitle: Toggle Like for Youtube Music Desktop App
commands.description: Like or unlike the current track in Youtube Music Desktop App

commands.name: toggleDislike
commands.title: Toggle Dislike
commands.subtitle: Toggle Dislike for Youtube Music Desktop App
commands.description: Dislike or remove dislike for the current track in Youtube Music Desktop App

commands.name: shuffle
commands.title: Toggle Shuffle
commands.subtitle: Toggle Shuffle for Youtube Music Desktop App
commands.description: Turn shuffle on or off in Youtube Music Desktop App

commands.name: seekTo
commands.title: Seek To
commands.subtitle: Seek To Position for Youtube Music Desktop App
commands.description: Seek to a specific position in the current track in Youtube Music Desktop App

commands.name: repeatMode
commands.title: Set Repeat Mode
commands.subtitle: Set Repeat Mode for Youtube Music Desktop App
commands.description: Set the repeat mode in Youtube Music Desktop App

commands.name: mute
commands.title: Mute
commands.subtitle: Mute Youtube Music Desktop App
commands.description: Mute the audio in Youtube Music Desktop App

commands.name: unmute
commands.title: Unmute
commands.subtitle: Unmute Youtube Music Desktop App
commands.description: Unmute the audio in Youtube Music Desktop App

commands.name: setVolume
commands.title: Set Volume
commands.subtitle: Set Volume for Youtube Music Desktop App
commands.description: Set the volume to a specific level in Youtube Music Desktop App

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
